name: Talis Game HD
description:
"In 2018, Beny Studios Decided To Remake Their First Ever Game From Scratch, And Lets Say.. It Has The Same Bugs."


TALIS GAME HD!

Expirence Talis Game In A New Way With Wide Screen Support, And Now HD! Built From The Ground Up Using New Code! And The Assets Are The Same As Their Charming Selves, No Need To Worry! Made Possible With Clickteam Fusion 2.5.


This Game Is  A Birthday Present To My Friend, Clayton, Who Has Been A Friend To Me For 7 Years, Its His BDAY! Go Support Him!

YT: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChkP8F2p5BKPGVsLGceZPyQ
Disc: Clayton#9460

He Is An Awesome Friend And Big Happy Birthday To Him!
